avdta.vehicle.wallet

Class StaticWallet

  • java.lang.Object
    • avdta.vehicle.wallet.Wallet
      • avdta.vehicle.wallet.StaticWallet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class StaticWallet
extends Wallet
    This wallet bids the same amount of money at each intersection.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
